name: Mob Stadium
description: Mob Stadium holds the secret to escaping the end of all time. Traps, challenges, and a Grand Finale await your demise in this challenging shooter made for the HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 1000 MB available space
